name: jarvis-skills
description: Custom skills for Project Jarvis - AI-powered personal assistant with lifelog indexing, AG-UI protocol integration, and real-time voice interaction

plugins.name: ag-ui-expert
plugins.description: Expert-level AG-UI protocol implementation for building real-time agent-user interfaces. Use when implementing SSE-based agent streaming, LangGraph-to-frontend integration, CopilotKit setup, bidirectional state sync with JSON Patch, human-in-the-loop patterns, or any agent UI requiring real-time event streaming.
